#summary Details on getFieldsNamesForItemFixedPrice() API function
#sidebar ApiFunctions

Call this function to get a list of fields name you can use to handle a fixed price item


== Call ==

 * syntax : getFieldsNamesForItemFixedPrice()

== Response ==

 * response : _array_ : the response is always an array of 2 elements
  * element 1 : _boolean_ : true (if call ok) or false (if call not ok)
  * element 2 : 
   * if call ok : _array_ : list of fields name you can use to handle a fixed price item
   * if call not ok : _string_ : error message

== Code example (PHP) ==
{{{
//FUNCTION CALL
$objSoapClient = new SoapClient('http://api.delcampe.net/soap.php?wsdl');
$return = $objSoapClient->getFieldsNamesForItemFixedPrice();
}}}
